metadata.title: CVE-2021-3778 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
vim is vulnerable to Heap-based Buffer Overflow

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3778` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu2
vim-athena - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu2
vim-common - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu2
vim-gtk - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu2
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu2
vim-gui-common - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu2
vim-nox - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu2
vim-runtime - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu2
vim-tiny - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu2
xxd - 2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.2.2434-3ubuntu2').
